channel.title: Shikigami SSR - Onmyoji on GAME OKKO
channel.description: Recent content in Shikigami SSR - Onmyoji on GAME OKKO

item.title: SSR Kujaku Myoo Skill Set in Onmyoji
item.description: Skill 1: Plume Dart Damage, Control, Orb 0 Conjures darts of plumes to strike 1 enemy, dealing damage equal to 100% of her ATK with a 30% Base Chance of inflicting Disarm. While she’s performing a Train-rattling, changes the skill to Plume Razor with its skill level equal to the skill level of Plume Dart. Lv.2 Increases damage to 105% Lv.3 Increases damage to 110%. Lv.4 Increases damage to 115%. Lv.
